name: Bomberhase
description:
This is the early prototype of the first game I made with the Godot engine. It is intendet for playtesting only at the moment. I was inspired by the awesome Jam Game Towerbag, you can find it here: https://matheuscunegato.itch.io/towerbag

Controls are W,A,S,D to move and SPACE to pick up and drop bombs. Bombs deal higher damage in the inner radius and can chain into each other.

When you were invited as a playtester (or want to take part in this project) please visit the link below to give feedback on the game :)

Playtester Feedback: https://forms.gle/W3q4xCygAKmiA8RX9
